modName: King Bran's Final Voyage (The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt - Main Menu Sound)
summary: very simple sound overhaul of the main menu
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][size=4][size=5]King Bran's Final Voyage
[size=3][i]Composed by Marcin Przybylowicz, Mikolai Stroinski, Percival
[/i][/size][/size][/size][size=3][i]




This is a very simple sound overhaul of the main menu.
Since the music is very important to me, I decided to share it with you.

[color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.  (Save the original: mus_maintheme)
Simple, for free . . .
[/color]

My other mod link:  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/11889623?tab=about+me]clauDA[/url]


The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt OST : King Bran's Final Voyage Extended
[youtube]2ajDhEhKYCY[/youtube]
[/i][/size][/color][/font]
